name: Coalossal
description: While it’s engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.

attacks.name: Coal Cannon
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 90 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Wild Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.
